EmailTemplate.name: 202004_Americas_CH_BGA_MSP-Viasat-partnership_Email.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell MSP Avionics: New Viasat Coverage Now Available
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Honeywell is proud to announce a new third-party partnership with Viasat that expands our range of product coverage to deliver a more comprehensive service to you, our valued MSP-Avionics customers! Specifically, we’re now offering additional coverage on the Viasat VR-12T SATCOM products on Gulfstream and Bombardier platforms.
Our MSP-Avionics plan will continue to provide real value to your operations through enhanced aircraft resale value, and other benefits such as financial predictability and simplified budgeting. These added benefits of including third-party partnerships are intended to reduce the maintenance burden and ensure your aircraft is where it belongs – up in the sky.
To learn more about this additional MSP-Avionics coverage with Viasat, contact our MSP-Avionics team below. CONTACT YOUR TEAM <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/services/maintenance-and-service-plans/maintenance-service-plan-avionics-business-aviation?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_bga_msp_avionics&utm_term=viasat-partnership]]>
